Package de.chojo.sadu.queries.calls

Class BatchCall

java.lang.Object
de.chojo.sadu.queries.calls.BatchCall
All Implemented Interfaces:
Calls
public class BatchCall extends Object implements Calls
The BatchCall class represents a collection of calls on the same query. It allows adding multiple Call objects and combining them into a single batch.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    BatchCall()
    The BatchCall class represents a collection of calls on the same query.
    BatchCall(Call call)
    Constructs a new instance of BatchCall and adds a single Call to it.
    BatchCall(List<Call> calls)
    Represents a batch call, which is a collection of individual query calls.

    • add

      public BatchCall add(Call call)
      Adds a CallImpl object to the list of calls.
      Parameters:
      call - The call to be added to the list.
      Returns:
      The updated object.

    • combine

      public BatchCall combine(BatchCall call)
      Combines the calls from the given BatchCall object with the calls of the current BatchCall object. The calls are added to the current BatchCall object.
      Parameters:
      call - The BatchCall object whose calls will be combined with the current BatchCall object's calls.
      Returns:
      The current BatchCall object after combining the calls.
